publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-467 George Foulkes: Scottish Football Success—That the Parliament congratulates Alex McLeish and the rest of the Scottish football team on their historic victory over France; commends Scotland and Everton striker, James McFadden, on an excellent goal, and wishes Scotland every success in qualifying for the finals of the European championship in 2008. Supported by: David Stewart*, Rhoda Grant*, Peter Peacock*, Jamie Stone*, John Lamont*, Michael McMahon*, Mary Mulligan*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Elizabeth Smith*, Nanette Milne*, Hugh Henry*, Alex Johnstone*, Alison McInnes*, Des McNulty*, Patricia Ferguson*, Trish Godman*, Margaret Smith*, Angela Constance*, Richard Baker*, Elaine Murray*, Bill Aitken*, James Kelly*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Karen Gillon*, Tavish Scott*, John Park*, Andy Kerr*, Cathie Craigie*, Murdo Fraser*, Charlie Gordon*

S3M-467 George Foulkes: Scottish Football Success—That the Parliament congratulates Alex McLeish and the rest of the Scottish football team on their historic victory over France; commends Scotland and Everton striker, James McFadden, on an excellent goal, and wishes Scotland every success in qualifying for the finals of the European championship in 2008. Supported by: David Stewart, Rhoda Grant, Peter Peacock, Jamie Stone, John Lamont, Michael McMahon, Mary Mulligan, Hugh O’Donnell, Elizabeth Smith, Nanette Milne, Hugh Henry, Alex Johnstone, Alison McInnes, Des McNulty, Patricia Ferguson, Trish Godman, Margaret Smith, Angela Constance, Richard Baker, Elaine Murray, Bill Aitken, James Kelly, Marilyn Livingstone, Karen Gillon, Tavish Scott, John Park, Andy Kerr, Cathie Craigie, Murdo Fraser, Charlie Gordon, Robin Harper*, Cathy Peattie*, Sandra White*, Mike Pringle*, Rhona Brankin*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-467 Scottish Football Success (lodged on 13 September 2007) Jackie Baillie*
S3M-467 Scottish Football Success (lodged on 13 September 2007) David Whitton*
S3M-467 Scottish Football Success (lodged on 13 September 2007) Jack McConnell*
